author: Good Work
description: More like Sad Hour  – or like Depressed Hour, or maybe like Unhappy Hour or Dissatisfied Hour or Melancholic Minute or like Sad Hour, or did I say that already?  Gloomy? Gray? Glum? Sorry I’m on the G section of the thesaurus. Is that how thesauruses work?  idk. The point is that it’s called happy hour but it’s not like necessarily happy. Or that was our idea when we first thought of it. Honestly, I have a pretty good time at happy hours, but sometimes when I leave I wonder if the people there actually like me. So maybe that’s why I’m being so cynical about it. As a sort of way to protect myself. I hope this doesn’t ruin them for you. Maybe it’s just that I’m not happy. Don’t let me yuck your yum, as it were. Or more like Sad Hour! Yeah. that’s the one. #relatable #work #happyhour
title: Happy Hour sucks.
